original_text: But Saul brought great trouble to the believers. He wanted to destroy their whole group. So he went to all their houses. He took hold of the believers and he put them into prison. He did that to both men and women.
korean_text: 사울이 교회를 잔멸할새 각 집에 들어가 남녀를 끌어다가 옥에 넘기니라

sentences.original_text: But Saul brought great trouble to the believers
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 사울은 신자들에게 큰 고통을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He wanted to destroy their whole group
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 전체 집단을 멸망시키고 싶었습니다

sentences.original_text: So he went to all their houses
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그들의 모든 집에 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He took hold of the believers
and he put them into prison
He did that to both men and women
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 남자와 여자 모두에게 그렇게 했습니다
